messages.message:
Brian
What is your phone number?
Iga: 9282218555 
Hi Bobby its Iga stay with us when here id love to see you:* xoxoxooo
Hey Iga and Brian; I have some sad news. Jerry Kolesar, the father of my ex-boyfriend, passed away Saturday morning. I may or may not be going to AZ to pay my respects.

Brian
Oh No!
Iga will call you.
Come visit
When is the funeral?
Iga wants to go, please give us the info.
Thank you Bobby
The friend who told me hasn't gotten back to me yet on when the service will be, or if it's ok with my ex that I go to it, so I've just been waiting for that info
The service will be on Friday at 11:00 am. I will head to AZ on Thursday

Brian
You are welcome to stay in our guest bedroom for 5 days.
We can do something fun on the weekend.

Brian
https://vimeo.com/66125779
Gay Niggers From Outer Space
This enigmatic video was submitted to a bi-annual avantgarde video festival in the early 1990-ties. However, it was never shown, maybe because of its multi-offensive…
vimeo.com
Delightful cinematography.
